results.title: Simvastatin improves the healing of infected skin wounds of rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ improves the healing of @<m>DISEASE_Wound_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014946 @@@infected skin wounds@@@ of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Rego AC, Araújo Filho I, Damasceno BP, Egito ES, Silveira IA, Brandão-Neto J, Medeiros AC. Simvastatin improves the healing of infected skin wounds of rats. Acta Cir Bras. 2007 Mar-Apr;22 Suppl 1():57-63. PMID: 17505657
citations.BibTeX: @article{17505657, title={Simvastatin improves the healing of infected skin wounds of rats.}, author={Rego AC and Araújo Filho I and Damasceno BP and Egito ES and Silveira IA and Brandão-Neto J and Medeiros AC}, journal={Acta Cir Bras}, volume={22 Suppl 1}, pages={57-63}}

results.title: Topical simvastatin promotes healing of Staphylococcus aureus-contaminated cutaneous wounds.
results.text_hl: Collectively, topical application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has the potential as a novel modality for managing @<m>DISEASE_Wound_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014946 @@@wound infections@@@ and promoting wound healing.

citations.NLM: Wang CC, Yang PW, Yang SF, Hsieh KP, Tseng SP, Lin YC. Topical simvastatin promotes healing of Staphylococcus aureus-contaminated cutaneous wounds. Int Wound J. 2016 Dec;13(6):1150-1157. PMID: 25752328
citations.BibTeX: @article{25752328, title={Topical simvastatin promotes healing of Staphylococcus aureus-contaminated cutaneous wounds.}, author={Wang CC and Yang PW and Yang SF and Hsieh KP and Tseng SP and Lin YC}, journal={Int Wound J}, volume={13}, number={6}, pages={1150-1157}}

results.title: Dodecenylsuccinic anhydride modified collagen hydrogels loaded with simvastatin as skin wound dressings.
results.text_hl: Herein, we developed a hydrophobic wound dressing to incorporate @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, which has potential application in the treatment of @DISEASE_Ulcer @DISEASE_MESH:D014456 @@@ulcers@@@ and prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Wound_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014946 @@@wound infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Olivetti CE, Alvarez Echazú MI, Perna O, Perez CJ, Mitarotonda R, De Marzi M, Desimone MF, Alvarez GS. Dodecenylsuccinic anhydride modified collagen hydrogels loaded with simvastatin as skin wound dressings. J Biomed Mater Res A. 2019 Sep;107(9):1999-2012. PMID: 31071230
citations.BibTeX: @article{31071230, title={Dodecenylsuccinic anhydride modified collagen hydrogels loaded with simvastatin as skin wound dressings.}, author={Olivetti CE and Alvarez Echazú MI and Perna O and Perez CJ and Mitarotonda R and De Marzi M and Desimone MF and Alvarez GS}, journal={J Biomed Mater Res A}, volume={107}, number={9}, pages={1999-2012}}

results.title: Exploring simvastatin, an antihyperlipidemic drug, as a potential topical antibacterial agent
results.text_hl: Topical treatment with 1 and 3% @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly reduced the @DISEASE_Staphylococcal_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D013203 @@@MRSA@@@ load in @<m>DISEASE_Wound_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014946 @@@infected skin wounds@@@ by 75 and 90% respectively.

citations.NLM: Thangamani S, Mohammad H, Abushahba MF, Hamed MI, Sobreira TJ, Hedrick VE, Paul LN, Seleem MN. Exploring simvastatin, an antihyperlipidemic drug, as a potential topical antibacterial agent Sci Rep. 2015 Nov 10;5():16407. PMID: 26553420
citations.BibTeX: @article{26553420, title={Exploring simvastatin, an antihyperlipidemic drug, as a potential topical antibacterial agent}, author={Thangamani S and Mohammad H and Abushahba MF and Hamed MI and Sobreira TJ and Hedrick VE and Paul LN and Seleem MN}, journal={Sci Rep}, volume={5}, pages={16407}}
